text: Charles Deckert (born 30 July 1880, date of death unknown) was a French gymnast. He competed in the men's individual all-around event at the 1900 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1880 births Category:Year of death missing Category:French male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of France Category:Gymnasts at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Reims
title: Charles Deckert
